info.task: navigate out of start of radio group
info.title: Navigate out of the start of a radio group

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstRadioButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first radio button

user: With focus on the 'Regular crust' radio button, navigate out of the radio group.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Regular crust' radio button, navigate out of the radio group.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Name of the group, 'Pizza Crust', is conveyed
name 'Navigate forwards from here' is conveyed
